name: Make'em Unreal!
description:
Save the city!

Your city is under attack. Tons of meteorites are coming and only one kind of meteorite is unreal (shape, color and rotation).

There is only one way to protect the city: make'em unreal and transform them until you get the unreal one! This will save the city!

Flying over the city, try create all necessary spheres to make all meteorites unreal. This will save the city! And remember... the size of the spheres matters!

If you feel blocked and don't have enough life to pass the next level, please restart again by clicking on right button (RESTART) and you will start again  by keeping the best score.

Notice the bigger the spheres are, the more transformations the meteorites will suffer. Be smart and combine all together to make'em unreal!

Game available in the browser (WebGL) and also downloadable.

Enjoy!

Commands
  • Arrows to move
  • Z = Create and Expand the Sphere
  • X = Choose type of Sphere
  • C = Reduce and Destroy the Sphere
Credits
  • Background Music: Bigvegie
  • Game Over & Level Completed SFX: Absolutely_CrayCray and Tuudurt
  • Font: BD Cartoon

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.
